name: Nilou
title: "Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou
desc: Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

talent_card.name: The Starry Skies Their Flowers Rain

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Nilou to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

skills.name: Dance of Haftkarsvar
skills.desc: Deals 3 Hydro DMG, if the party includes Hydro Characters and Dendro Characters and characters from no other Elements, create 1 Golden Chalice's Bounty.

skills.name: Dance of Abzendegi: Distant Dreams, Listening Spring
skills.desc: Deals 2 Hydro DMG. The target character receives Lingering Aeon.
